titleStmt.title: A speech made by King Henry the 8th. To the House of Commons the 23. of December, 1546. And in the 38. yeare of his raigne.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
Henry VIII, King of England, 1491-1547.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Blackmore, at the signe of the Angell in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Variant: ornament is upside-down with smoother edge at bottom.
